description: Rule describes an alerting or recording rule.

alert.description: Alert is a name for alert

annotations.description: Annotations will be added to rule configuration

debug.description: Debug enables logging for rule it useful for tracking

expr.description: Expr is query, that will be evaluated at dataSource

for.description: For evaluation interval in time.Duration format 30s, 1m, 1h  or nanoseconds

keep_firing_for.description: KeepFiringFor will make alert continue firing for this long even when the alerting expression no longer has results. Use time.Duration format, 30s, 1m, 1h  or nanoseconds

labels.description: Labels will be added to rule configuration

record.description: Record represents a query, that will be recorded to dataSource

update_entries_limit.description: UpdateEntriesLimit defines max number of rule's state updates stored in memory. Overrides `-rule.updateEntriesLimit` in vmalert.
